Modules.Desperately Seeking Selûne:
{{Main|Desperately Seeking Selûne}} {{Quote|'''Low Tier: "Another Rescue"'''
The Midsummer's Festival is attacked. A visiting High Priestess is kidnapped. Deputy Mayor O'Kane needs your help to recover this priestess before the Red Wizards get their hands on her. This adventure is designed for low- and mid-level characters.
'''High Tier: "Dealing With Darkness"'''
The Midsummer's Festival has come to Ravens Bluff again. You've been invited to enjoy yourself in the Temple District, while others of you have been asked to provide security during the event. But just what dark menace may rear its ugly head in this atmosphere of good cheer? Are you willing to find out? This adventure is designed for high-level characters.''}} * '''Designer(s):''' [[Chris Ruester]] * '''Released:''' October 1999 ''Parts 3 & 4 of the "Red Threats" series.''
